title: 'Sup Son
name: sup-son
description:
Sup son, table flip, other cool emoji copied right into your clipboard.

 Currently supported keybindings:
* Ctrl+SHIFT+s: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
* Ctrl+SHIFT+z: (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
author: Jeff Griffiths ( @canuckistani )
